                           AssoDataObject assoDataObject,
                           java.lang.String[] fieldNames,
                           java.lang.String[] columnNames)
Constructs a new data multiple choice model.

Parameters:
rootDataObject - the main data object which is the entity that is to be assigned to one or more keys
keyDataObject - the key containing data object, e.g. a group
assoDataObject - the relational entity data object
fieldNames - the columns of the key database table
columnNames - the column name of the display grid
